pages.title: Главная
pages.purpose: Introduce the .github repository, its purpose as a GitHub organization profile, and provide a high-level overview of what it documents (the НЕЙМАРК_Стартап platform)

pages.title: НЕЙМАРК_Стартап Platform
pages.purpose: Main overview page for the НЕЙМАРК_Стартап web platform system, explaining its mission to support young technological entrepreneurship and providing a high-level architectural summary

pages.title: Platform Overview & Goals
pages.purpose: Detailed explanation of the platform's purpose, the problems it solves for early-stage startups, and its role within the НЕЙМАРК IT campus ecosystem

pages.title: User Roles & Target Audience
pages.purpose: Comprehensive description of the four user roles (Стартаперы, Менторы, Инвесторы, Администраторы), their demographics, responsibilities, and how they interact within the ecosystem

pages.title: Core Functional Modules
pages.purpose: Overview of the five main functional areas of the platform and how they work together to support the startup lifecycle

pages.title: Personal Account (Личный кабинет)
pages.purpose: Deep dive into the Personal Account system as the central hub, covering personalized dashboards, profile management, and the notification system

pages.title: Teams & Projects (Команды и проекты)
pages.purpose: Documentation of the team formation features, including co-founder search by skills/roles, team management, and project progress tracking functionality

pages.title: Training & Mentorship (Обучение и менторство)
pages.purpose: Explanation of the mentorship system, including the mentor catalog, consultation booking system, and ratings/reviews mechanism

pages.title: Competitions & Grants (Конкурсы и гранты)
pages.purpose: Description of how the platform aggregates funding opportunities, maintains a deadlines calendar, and provides automatic notifications for relevant opportunities

pages.title: Analytics (Аналитика)
pages.purpose: Documentation of the analytics module designed for administrators, including user activity statistics, project success metrics, and interactive dashboards

pages.title: System Architecture & Integration
pages.purpose: Technical architecture deep dive covering the hub-and-spoke design, inter-module communication patterns, and how functional modules integrate with the Personal Account hub

pages.title: Data Architecture & Workflows
pages.purpose: Explanation of the data model, including user profiles, project databases, mentor catalogs, and the event-driven notification system architecture

pages.title: Repository Organization
pages.purpose: Explanation of how this .github repository is structured, its role as a GitHub organization profile repository, and what each directory contains

pages.title: Profile Directory
pages.purpose: Documentation of the profile/ directory structure and how profile/README.md serves as the organization's public-facing documentation

pages.title: Data Assets Directory
pages.purpose: Overview of the data/ directory contents, including bug documentation images, issue screenshots, and other supporting visual assets
